entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
